Statistik Thomas Petersen 2018-07-11 Chapter 1 Forudsætninger \[\begin{array}{ccc} x_{11} & x_{12} & x_{13}\\ x_{21} & x_{22} & x_{23} \end{array}\] This is a sample book written in Markdown. You can use anything that Pandoc’s Markdown supports, e.g., a math equation \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\). The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github: install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.name/tinytex/.
